description:
You pick the activity, and these socks will help you get there. With Its blend of materials and supportive cushioning, you’ll be picking these socks for every occasion. And being made in Canada makes them as sweet as maple syrup on butter tarts.

  • The merino wool and nylon blend gives you the comfort and durability for every hike
  • The arch support, double cuff and calf ribbing provide you with lots of protection
  • Reinforced heel and toe impact zones keeps your feet feeling better for longer
name: J.B. Field's Super-Wool Hiker GX Quarter Socks - Unisex
